name: anycable
description: AnyCable is a scalable WebSocket server that replaces ActionCable for Ruby on Rails apps. It decouples the PubSub layer, works with gRPC, supports multiple languages and drastically improves real-time performance.
features: Scalable WebSockets: High-performance WebSocket server for Rails applications. Handle thousands of connections.
ActionCable Replacement: Drop-in replacement with dramatically improved performance. Upgrade seamlessly.
gRPC Support: Decoupled architecture using gRPC for language flexibility. Not limited to Ruby.
Multi-Language: Works with applications written in various programming languages. Universal compatibility.
Real-Time Performance: Optimized for low-latency, high-throughput real-time features. Lightning fast.
Resource Efficient: Uses significantly less memory than traditional ActionCable. Cost-effective scaling.
